mainText:
I am in some hospital of India treating my mother for cancer. This morning,
I woke up and I was going through the tweets. I saw RIP Steve Jobs. My heart
was crushed. I was so sure that I was still in sleep and this is not the
truth. But reality hit my face. Now it feels like I have lost a family. RIP
Steve, you will be missed immenesly. .
-- 
Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
author: Abhijeet
